history.content:
In my experience, TA’ing for a class requires you to really understand the material, beyond the level of the students. Given that you're a TA for Stat 134, I would imagine your probability is extremely strong. Sure, there may be specific topics in 126 that you haven't seen before, but given your prob. experience I think you could easily self-study those topics. 

If you love linear algebra, then maybe 127 is the way to go! Just my two cents though, I don't think you can go wrong with either in your case.

I'm pretty sure going to take CS189 on Spring 2020 before my graduation. But not sure about 126 or 127 for next semester.

For 126:

I did CS70 and Stat134 for the probability part, got decent grades for both of them, and being TA for Stat134 currently.

But looking at the content of 126 I still feel like it's a wonderful class to take to sharpen my skill and deepen my understanding of some important probability concepts that are very related to 189. Like Markov Chain and joint gaussian, both of which are covered relatively cursorily in 70 and 134 (134 doesn't talk about Markov at all and 70 just learn it for like 1.5 hours of lecture)

For 127:

I had math54, EE16a, and currently doing EE16b and Math110. I just LOVE linear algebra and the combo of 16b and 110 is amazing.

I'll definitely go for 127 if just considering my interest for the content.

But I feel like doing 126 instead of 127 would be more "strategic" for me. Since I'm pretty sure I have the motivation to self-study 127's content during the winter break, plus I'll be comfortable with SVD and PCA after 16b and 110. But the concepts like joint-gaussian in Prob are still not crystally clear to me.

I have other stuff to do so I'm pretty sure I can't handle the workload of 126+127 with a good learning outcome. So picking one of them to learn before 189 (and before my graduation) is really troubling me these days.

I know there are a lot of discussion about these three courses here from prof. and students, but any advice for which one to take considering my situation?
history.subject: 126 or 127 before 189 based on my situation
